author: David McHoul
title: TruePosition Announces Release of Next Generation Wi-Fi Location System
text:
TruePosition Inc ., a leading provider of wireless location solutions and a subsidiary of Liberty Broadband Corporation , announces the release of its next generation TrueFix location solution. The TrueFix system is a telecom-grade platform built for emergency call location (such as E9-1-1 or E1-1-2), resource tracking, M2M/IoT and enterprise applications that require accurate, private and secure location. At the core of the TrueFix platform is the TruePosition Wi-Fi location solution powered by the Skyhook Wireless crowd-sourced Wi-Fi database. The TrueFix Wi-Fi solution accurately locates phones and devices, particularly in areas where Assisted Global Positioning System (A-GPS) technology does not work well – such as indoors and in dense urban environments. The TrueFix platform also supports Enhanced Cell ID (E-CID) for phones that do not have Wi-Fi or A-GPS capabilities, and Z-Axis (vertical) location for phones and devices equipped with barometric pressure sensors. The system is scalable and cost effective, available in a cloud-based or on-premises implementation.
“The release of the TrueFix platform represents a significant step in our efforts to create a cost-effective, secure, carrier-grade system that will enable U.S. carriers to comply with the FCC’s E9-1-1 indoor mandate,” said Rob Anderson, TruePosition’s Executive Vice President of Engineering and Technology and Chief Technical Officer (CTO). “The same platform addresses a critical unmet need in the global emergency call location, M2M and Location-Based-Services (LBS) markets by locating phones and devices in areas where A-GPS does not work.”
The TrueFix demonstration version is available via an Android-based application that can be installed on any Wi-Fi capable phone. The demo application will allow users to track phones via a mobile app and Web-based interface. Contact TruePosition at demo(at)trueposition(dot)com for more information.
ABOUT TRUEPOSITION, THE LOCATION SPECIALISTS®
TruePosition has been developing, designing and deploying mission-critical geolocation solutions since 1992. Our rich history in public-safety-focused geolocation solutions has provided us with unmatched experience and expertise in location technologies and applications. Our technology portfolio and partner network enables us to specify and deploy the location solution that best fits the needs and budget of our customers. TruePosition is owned by Liberty Broadband Corporation ( http://www.libertybroadband.com ).
TruePosition’s Wi-Fi solution is powered by Skyhook Wireless ( http://www.skyhookwireless.com ), a subsidiary of TruePosition. Skyhook’s global Wi-Fi access point database is continuously updated, contains greater than one billion geolocated access points and provides billions of locations every month.
